description:
Write a program to determine the case (uppercase, lowercase, or neither) of a character entered by the user.

#### `Input Format:`

`The input consists of a single character entered by the user.`

#### `Output Format:`

`The program should output the case of the input character as follows:`
- `"Uppercase" if the input character is an uppercase letter.`
- `"Lowercase" if the input character is a lowercase letter.`
- `"Neither" if the input character is not an alphabet.`

#### `Sample Input 1:`

```
A
```

#### `Sample Output 1:`

```
Uppercase
```

#### `Sample Input 2:`

```
b
```

#### `Sample Output 2:`

```
Lowercase
```

#### `Sample Input 3:`

```
7
```

#### `Sample Output 3:`

```
Neither
```

#### `Constraints:`

- `The input character can be any printable ASCII character.`
- `The input character can be entered in either uppercase or lowercase.`
title: Character Case Checker
